title: we need to read books
description:
Emma had a few life realizations this week that can hopefully help everyone else out. Why reading is really good for you, learning to find the positives where you live, and when is gossiping OK? Plus, questions on staying focused, how to feel independent, and what we should look for in a life partner. And the new SZA and Doja Cat is crazy fun. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
